org.osmdroid.google.overlay
Class GoogleTilesOverlay

java.lang.Object
  com.google.android.maps.Overlay
      org.osmdroid.google.overlay.GoogleTilesOverlay

public class GoogleTilesOverlay
extends com.google.android.maps.Overlay

This class represents an OSM Tiles Overlay at a Google Map. It is a copy from the class org.osmdroid.views.overlay.TilesOverlay (r789) (formerly known as org.andnav.osm.views.overlay.OpenStreetMapTilesOverlay) and modified to make it working.
